romance does NOT end well. Watch the newest Vooza video. (http://vooza.com=

The @VoozaHQ Hot Five
We're speaking truth to power (or is it sarcasm to a sea of apathy?) on Tw=
itter...
1. Stop giving the NSA such a hard time...
Problem: Terrorists hate us for our freedoms.
Solution: Take away our own freedoms. (Tweet (https://twitter.com/voozahq/=
status/366989526410870784) )
2. We don=E2=80=99t make distinctions between IA and UI and UX. To us=2C t=
hey are all meaningless acronyms. (Tweet (https://twitter.com/voozahq/stat=
us/366950771335495681) )
3. Coding is like jazz. No one wants to hear you talk about it. (Tweet (ht=
tps://twitter.com/voozahq/status/365863563207774209) )
4. Just saw cutest popup alert ever! "Connect your Bing account now." Okaa=
ay=2C I'll get right on that...after I pet my Loch Ness Unicorn. (Tweet (h=
ttps://twitter.com/voozahq/status/365578199243046912) )
5. Gotta give it to Bezos. Travelling to outer space and running a profita=
ble newspaper are both glorious fantasies! (Tweet (https://twitter.com/voo=
zahq/status/364765497054601216) )

Get in the mix here: Follow @VoozaHQ at Twitter (http://www.twitter.com/vo=
ozahq)  and/or "Like" us on Facebook. (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Vooza=
/101946233270299)

=09<p class=3D"p2">
=09=09<strong>The @VoozaHQ Hot Five</strong><br>
=09=09We&#39;re speaking truth to power (or is it sarcasm to a sea of apat=
hy?) on Twitter...</p>
=09<ol>
=09=09<li>
=09=09=09<div>
=09=09=09=09Stop giving the NSA such a hard time...</div>
=09=09=09<div>
=09=09=09=09Problem: Terrorists hate us for our freedoms.</div>

li>
=09=09<li>

=2C they are all meaningless acronyms. (<a href=3D"http://vooza.us4.list-m=

=09=09<li>
